title: verify failed when deploy on bsctest network
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [X] Foundry
- [X] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (fcae63a 2023-10-08T00:31:37.838144000Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

forge 0.2.0 (fcae63a 2023-10-08T00:31:37.838144000Z)

### Operating System

macOS (Apple Silicon)

### Describe the bug

foundry.toml:
```
[rpc_endpoints]
bsc-testnet= "${BSCTEST_RPC_URL}"

[etherscan]
bsc-testnet = { key = "${BSCSCAN_API_KEY}", url = "https://api-testnet.bscscan.com/api" }
```

deploy and verify:
```
forge script script/DeployMessaging.s.sol:DeployMessing --broadcast --verify --rpc-url ${BSCTEST_RPC_URL}
```

error:
```
Contract [src/Messaging.sol:Messaging] "0x6Cf1Bb3494a0dbf0deAa3726F162c441a61C2485" is already verified. Skipping verification.
Start verifying contract `0xd03cB2E66dB5F81Dc1926E21972D46DDcfe06F61` deployed on bsc-testnet

Submitting verification for [lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/proxy/ERC1967/ERC1967Proxy.sol:ERC1967Proxy] "0xd03cB2E66dB5F81Dc1926E21972D46DDcfe06F61".
Encountered an error verifying this contract:
Response: `NOTOK`
Details: `Invalid API Key`
```
